data.meta_description: Alan Alda is an icon as well as a deeply dedicated supporter of Stony Brook University.  He is a powerful and passionate force in communicating science acrossâ€¦
data.text:
An official welcome to David Wrobel, our new Dean of the Stony Brook University College of Arts and Sciences! An experienced administrator and renowned scholar of American history, David received his MA and PhD degrees in American Intellectual History from Ohio University and a BA in history/philosophy from the University of Kent. He is a historian of the American West and American thought and culture, and has been recognized for excellence in teaching, research, and service. Learn more about David https://bit.ly/DavidWrobel Anna Maria Gounaris Surita Bhatia Bonita London, PhD Maria Nagan Lois Carter Erica Hackley Ming Huang Soraya Zabihi University of Oklahoma University of Nevada-Las Vegas Widener University Hartwick College The College of Wooster

Be a key member of the senior leadership team, reporting directly to the Vice President for Advancement. Who You Are: A strategic and creative leader who thrives in a culture high in competence and low in ego. Comfortable with taking risks, fostering a culture of candor, and driving excellence. Passionate about enhancing lifelong relationships and increasing philanthropic support. With Stony Brook University experiencing significant momentum and growth, this is an exciting moment to join our dynamic team. We are hiring! Are you ready to make an impact in the exciting world of college athletics and alumni relations? We're looking for a dynamic individual to join our exceptional team at Stony Brook Athletics and Stony Brook University Advancement. Coordinator of Alumni Engagement - Lifelong & Athletics Engagement: ðŸ”— https://bit.ly/3xOj0LF Here's your chance to be part of something incredible, where you'll play a key role in enhancing the overall constituent experience. Imagine strengthening relationships between alumni, Stony Brook University, and the Stony Brook Alumni Association through innovative programming and engaging initiatives. And guess what? We're all about having fun along the way! Join us in creating memorable experiences and shaping the future of alumni engagement. Apply today! #HigherEducation #AlumniRelations #UniversityAlumniRelations
